bibl.title: Grečeskij keramičeskij import VI v. do n.e. v Gize (Iz raskopok Rossijskoj arkheologičeskoj ekspedicii v Egipte). Avec résumé en anglais: 6th Century Greek Ceramic Import in Giza (From Excavations by the Russian Archaeological Mission in Egypt).
bibl.note: Imported Greek 6th century B.C. ceramics in Giza [amphorae from Chios and Clazomenae]. Those finds must be connected with Memphis and its Greek colony.
bibl.seg: MALYKH S.E., Grečeskij keramičeskij import VI v. do n.e. v Gize (Iz raskopok Rossijskoj arkheologičeskoj ekspedicii v Egipte). Avec résumé en anglais: 6th Century Greek Ceramic Import in Giza (From Excavations by the Russian Archaeological Mission in Egypt).
Imported Greek 6th century B.C. ceramics in Giza [amphorae from Chios and Clazomenae]. Those finds must be connected with Memphis and its Greek colony.
